news.title: Jim Gavin’s family deeply hurt as he fights back against ‘malicious’ smears being spread online amid presidential race
news.summary: Presidential candidate Jim Gavin is ­fighting “malicious smears” about his private life that have spread across social media since he was declared as Fianna Fáil’s choice for Áras an Uachtaráin.

news.title: ‘I had questions about Katie Simpson and I have questions here’ – former detective’s concern over case of woman (23) found dead in Monaghan canal
news.summary: A former police officer who investigated the murder of showjumper Katie Simpson has raised concerns over the unexplained death of a young woman found in a Monaghan canal.

news.title: Sports Minister and TDs frustrated as FAI pulls out of planned Oireachtas committee meeting
news.summary: The Sports Minister has expressed frustration with the Football Association of Ireland’s decision to pull out of a planned meeting with an Oireachtas sport committee next week to discuss safeguarding issues.

news.title: Landlords are selling up in many regional towns after Rent Pressure Zone extension
news.summary: A flood of landlord-led home sales is sweeping across Ireland’s regional towns following changes to the Rent Pressure Zone (RPZ) rules.

news.title: Three people are killed in separate road accidents over the weekend
news.summary: Three people died in separate accidents on Irish roads over the weekend as fatalities this year are now almost equal to the number of deaths over the same period in 2024.

news.title: Eamonn Sweeney: Arteta and Guardiola are producing teams that are less than the sum of their parts
news.summary: Pep Guardiola has lost his nerve and Mikel Arteta is trying to find his. Their combined crises of confidence are very good news for Arne Slot and Liverpool.

news.title: Ask Allison: We have a fifth child on the way and we’re overstretched – my wife is unrealistic with our time and money
news.summary: Question:  We are expecting our fifth child – a little bit of a surprise, and one we are happy about. We have four healthy, lovely, sporty kids and weekends are bonkers with our various sports, training, and matches... Sometimes it feels like trying to run a taxi service, a restaurant and a launderette!

news.title: Donald Trump calls Charlie Kirk an ‘American hero’ and says he ‘hates’ opponents at memorial
news.summary: President Donald Trump said that he “hates” his political opponents moments after Erika Kirk, the widow of slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk, forgave her husband’s killer in an emotional tribute at his memorial.

news.title: Childhood cancer: ‘Your heart sinks, your stomach flips. But immediately you know that you need to be strong for your child’
news.summary: Sophia Kelly was 12 in May 2024, just several weeks past her Confirmation, when she found a lump on her collarbone.

news.title: Dear Vicki: ‘A new manager has messed up the business. But was it actually my fault?’
news.summary: Q I run a small family-owned café and bakery in the west of Ireland. Recently, we hired a new manager to help me because the workload was becoming too much.
